detailed log reports every day containing a wealth of
user data and app activity.

And all members of
the Communist Party were directed to download the
app as well as other companies and organizations were
also pushing their members

to download this app. So bottom line, I think there is
potentially a lot of bad things

that can happen because
of what's going on and how we move to
the digital world.

And I think it behooves
us all as citizens to keep track of what's
going on and to try and push

our government to limit what
both the government itself

and what companies can do. Because ultimately when you
move to see what a totalitarian

government can do with
all this information, that's actually pretty scary.
